item.description:
Join us for another night of dancing and Portuguese conversation.

 

This is a great way to learn something new and practice your Portuguese with native speakers.

 

There is no obligation to dance, but if you would like to learn, there is a one hour lesson.

 

Forró class at 9:00 pm $10 cash (you can just drop in)
Live Band at 10:30pm

 

Looking forward to seeing you!

 

When you RSVP, please let us know what time we can expect you.
item.how_to_find_us: Once I have a better idea of how many people will be attending, I will let you know where our table will be.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Forró and Portuguese conversation
